name: Quest To Avalon
description: You are a galactic explorer who has found an Infinity Cube. Look into the cube and see a glimpse of uncharted and unexplored dimensions. You want to find the legendary dimension called Avalon which is said to be a paradise dimension, granting you any wish or desire. Click the cube to generate enough power for a dimensional shift. Though you can shift dimensions, you have no control over which dimension the cube will reveal next. Keep shifting dimensions until you reach Avalon.
